entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
